net.dean.jraw.pagination

Class AbstractPaginator.Builder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.dean.jraw.pagination.AbstractPaginator.Builder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of Thing that will be returned by the created paginator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimplePaginator.Builder, SpecificPaginator.Builder, UserPaginatorSubmission.Builder
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractPaginator<T extends Thing>

    public abstract static class AbstractPaginator.Builder<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a way to easily create Paginator objects with default values for some parameters
